ul.li: [MOD4J-93] - Projectsite mist user guide links incorrect
[MOD4J-175] - Xtext Check Violation: DtoReference not defined in model
[MOD4J-176] - Creating new project has "null" in the wizard
[MOD4J-190] - For the custom methods in services only javadoc in the interface is generated
[MOD4J-193] - Interechte foutmelding bij unique rule
[MOD4J-198] - The todo comment in the interface of domain services pollutes the Task List and is not correct.
[MOD4J-200] - Code completion shows to much models when importing
[MOD4J-202] - A lot of validation errors show up in the problem list after starting Eclipse
[MOD4J-206] - Foutieve generatie van DTO translator bij gebruik enum
[MOD4J-208] - Todo comment in DaoImpl classes unnecessary pollutes the tasklist
[MOD4J-210] - Generatie van service.dto voor een enum die begint met een kleine letter
[MOD4J-211] - Spring Context Unit Test fails
[MOD4J-215] - Inheritance in businessmodel zou associaties mee kunnen nemen
[MOD4J-222] - Unclear validation error description
[MOD4J-225] - Inheritance in businessmodel: Hibernate runtime error "Cannot use identity column key generation with union-subclass mapping"
[MOD4J-188] - Mandatory multiplicity is the business DSL is not used in code generator
[MOD4J-189] - No code is generated in the service- and business layers for the generated dao listAll..() methods
[MOD4J-199] - Streamline the names and locations of the Spring context files
[MOD4J-205] - Foutmelding bij incorrecte volgorde in datacontract DSL niet duidelijk: Couldn't find property 'name' for inner type Void'
[MOD4J-226] - Automatic include of all attributes when references are use.
[MOD4J-228] - String maxlength not used in initial database schema generation
[MOD4J-34] - Eenvoudige user interface genereren i.v.m. het geven van demos
[MOD4J-78] - Support for bi-directional many-to-many associations.
[MOD4J-67] - Mod4j-common centraal beschikbaar stellen in de central repository van Maven
[MOD4J-117] - Write user manual for DataContract Dsl
[MOD4J-168] - Change distributionManagement to our central Maven repository at Codehaus.
[MOD4J-172] - Move the mod4j svn repository to codehaus
[MOD4J-174] - Activate continuous builds for the mod4j svn repository at Codehaus
[MOD4J-214] - Inheritance in het business model in user guide opnemen
[MOD4J-227] - Typefout in handleiding
